# ESA 2023

Conference of the Ecological Society of Australia. 3–7 Julio 2023, [Darwin](/lgrs/Darwin.qmd), Northern Territory

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| output: asis

library(FlickrAPI)
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
suppressMessages(here::i_am("lgrs/Trieste.qmd"))
file_name <- here::here("data","flickr-photos.rds")
all_photos <- readRDS(file=file_name)

seleccion <- c("David @ ESA2023 in Darwin")

photos <- all_photos %>% filter(title %in% seleccion) %>% slice_sample(n=1)
photos_info <- getPhotoInfo(photo_id = photos$id, output = "url")

cat(sprintf("<center>\n<img src='%s' width='%s'  height='%s' class='preview-image'>\n<br/>\n**%s** by <a href='%s' target='flickr'>JR Ferrer Paris @ flickr</a><br/></center>", 
         photos$url_m, photos$width_m, photos$height_m,
         photos$title,
         photos_info$content))
```

## Presentación y productos relacionados

- **Fire ecology traits of Australian plants: Creating a database to summarise scientific knowledge about plant response to fire events**. Por: Dr José Rafael Ferrer-Paris, University of New South Wales. [Presentación en `RPubs`](https://rpubs.com/jrfep/firevegdb-ESA2023)

Relacionado con el proyecto de la base de datos de respuestas de la vegetación al fuego:

> Ferrer-Paris, J. R. and Keith, D. A. (2022) Fire Ecology Traits for Plants: A database for fire research and management. Version 1.00. Centre for Ecosystem Science, University of New South Wales, Sydney, Australia. Retrieved from osf.io/hu96w
